title: Helitours to resume domestic commercial flights
body_lines: Sri Lanka Air Force on its anniversary day on 02nd March 2022, marked another milestone for the Helitours (Domestic Commercial Air Transport Service of Sri Lanka Air Force) when the company received the Air Operator Certificate (AOC) from the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka (CAASL) to recommence commercial air transport operations after a period of silence for the last couple of years.
